Title: Mr. Holmes
Actors: Ian McKellen, Laura Linney, Milo Parker, Hiroyuki Sanada
Plot: The story is set in 1947, following a long-retired Holmes living in a Sussex village with his housekeeper and her young son. But then he finds himself haunted by 30-year old case. Holmes memory isn't what it used to be, so he only remembers fragments of the case: a confrontation with an angry husband, a secret bond with his beautiful but unstable wife.
